name: Last Hope: the game where you never miss
name_original: Last Hope: the game where you never miss
description:
this is the prototype for my submission , if you have any question about it ask me i will respond as fast as possiblethis it's my first jam so i don't know if i'm doing it right 

the game has a little difference in the mechanic compared to other shooter : you can't shoot again if the previous bullet hasn't  been destroyed yet (by touching the walls or the enemy) and the bullet isn't that fast .

i hope you find some intersting way to exploit this gameplay and most important hope you have fun with the game

i used these assets :

sound : Game sound FX by Marvin Games

tilemap : Scut Pixel Tileset - 8x8 Roguelike

font : 16x16 pixel font 09

ps : sorry for my bad english
